subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Family hour around the radio
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
--_e1d32c1d-4f49-4e17-98cb-5f19c3e0d3c8_
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable


 I used to record sessions with my young grand son sitting on my lap cuz t=
he box would use his voice to talk me, it was a real kick, and no harm ever=
 came to the Grandson. I think your concerns are unfounded. 
 
 I talk abou=
t darkheads cuz I dont' know what it is for sure, a level, or faction that =
wants humanity kept inthe dark by using fear and deception. I you don't tak=
e them serious therye are far less affective in their work. By getting all =
fearful and full of "concerns" you are doing their work. 
 
 I'll say it ag=
ain, and offend the majority, but what you all think is known about the par=
anormal is mostly Hollywood. All the evidence you think you have is primari=
ly created out of your own expectations. This place you think is the physic=
al is no more solid than the spirits you chase. You can't trust your senses=
, any of them. 
 
 Frank-S


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: babiarz3@yaho=
o.comDate: Fri, 23 Nov 2007 22:13:56 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Family hou=
r around the radio




Hi Bruce~I understand the light heartedness of the "=
family hour" posts. I don'ttake any issue with that at all. The families of=
 those of us involvedin the paranormal HAVE to be a bit different then the =
average Joe's orSmith's. I only referred to that topic because of the other=
 stuffmentioned- negativity and dark ones.There is absolutely nothing in pl=
ace to safe guard who purchases thebox and who doesn't besides the cost. If=
 you've got the money or acredit card, the box is yours- whoever "you" are.=
I don't think we should presume anything about the purchasers of thebox. I =
know people in the filed who have never experienced anythingevil or dark an=
d wouldn't know what to do if they did. Admittedly,they can be and will be =
deceitful. I am in full support of further research and groups and individu=
alsworking together. However, IMHO, I think this falls into a differentcate=
gory. Morally and ethically, I think it is short sighted toapprove of or pr=
omote in any way, the distribution of this device atthis time. When we imag=
ine the possibilities, we need to imagine them all.Babs --- In EVP-ITC@yaho=
ogroups.com, bruce halliday<paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:>> babiarz3,=
> > I believe the posts you are referring to about family hour with the box=
> where written in a light manner in jest. I do not presume to speakfor any=
one > else on this group I'm sure they can speak for themselves.> > you spe=
ak of responsibility with any form of open communication, Ibelieve the indi=
viduals that are> studying and distributing the mini box are sufficiently e=
xperiencedand know who they should sell to and who not.> > I don't believe =
they mean to put the mini box on the shelves in toysr us. Anyone that uses =
a box whether it be a Frank's box> A Joe's box or a mini box will probably =
have done some research intothis method of evp and will probably have some =
intimate experience> with the paranormal field and if not I'm sure they wil=
l seek advicefrom those of us that have that experience. There is never a l=
ack ofadvice here.> > as far as dark heads go I know through personal exper=
ience that theycan be deceiving and manipulative with someone that does not=
 know anybetter> I have a Frank's box and a Joe's box and do serious resear=
ch on adaily basis. My opinion is the good spirits out weigh the negativeon=
es and anyone> that experiments with a box will tell you that you do forge =
strongbonds with what I call my spirit guides or technicians, the same twos=
pirits communicate > with me during every session and protect me from negat=
ivity. As longas I do not feed the darkies with my own negativity I am fine=
.> > Also I believe that the people who are distributing the mini boxhave s=
et that price to deter any average person that's completelyignorant of the =
paranormal> away from purchasing this device.> > I have never met bill pers=
onally but know of him, he is a wellrespected researcher and is well aware =
I think of the pitfalls as wellas the rewards of box communication.> and I =
don't believe he would ever endanger himself, his family oranyone else by c=
arelessly using the box for entertainment purposes.> > that Is my opinion f=
or what it's worth.> > Bruce> > > Bruce Halliday Paranormal Investigating T=
eam > > > To: EVP-ITC@...: babiarz3@...: Fri, 23 Nov 2007 19:58:45+0000Subj=
ect: [EVP-ITC] Re: Family hour around the radio> > > > > I am a fairly quie=
t person, most of the time. I have my thoughtsandopinions on topics but fee=
l strongly about "to each his own".Unlesssomething strikes me as completely=
 wrong, I won't debate. No oneherehas heard from me other than recently wit=
h this mini-box yet, Iamhere several times weekly reading and offering my e=
nergy in supportofthe research.However...something is striking me here and =
again, Ican't keep mymouth shut. The discussion about the family hour with =
thebox has ledthe way for people to mention negativity and even "the darkgu=
ys" canbe fun if not taken seriously.I ask you to consider the factthat man=
y who purchase the mini-boxwill not be of the right frame ofmind. Most will=
 not be in harmony.Many will take "the dark guys"seriously. Yet, you feel i=
t's a goodidea to let anyone who wants a boxhave one? All in the name ofsha=
ring technology.I know that my previousposts expressing my concern over the=
 massmarketing of the box, wasbarely given consideration. Realize that Iam =
not being selfish- I donot own a box. EVP is my passion and hasbeen from da=
y one 6 years agowhen I jumped fully into the field. I amsuccessful in capt=
uring EVP,always have been. I still do it the "oldfashioned way" with open =
airtechniques. Would I love to be able tohold real time 2 waycommunications=
 with the other side? Of course.However, I do not thinkenough research into=
 the possibilities hasbeen done to warrant theapproval let alone production=
 of these boxes. Those of us who havebeen on countless investigations with =
many peoplewill quickly admitthat there are some people we'd rather notinve=
stigate with. When theyare present, negative things tend tohappen. We all k=
now one or twopeople who we can say "felt dark" fromthe first meeting. We a=
ll admitthat being mentally sound is animportant quality in this field. If =
youhave mental issues, this maynot be the area of research for you. Wedon't=
 bring children oninvestigations for obvious reasons. BUT! If youwant a box=
 that couldpossibly open up a portal and bridge the gapbetween here and the=
dark, sure! Anyone who wants one should have it!You might feel that I am ov=
er reacting or being overly dramatic.That'sfine. My concern is not what you=
 think of me but that youconsider thepossibilities here. Many of which we d=
o not know. Can yoube 100% surethat this is a good idea or that it's worthy=
 of saying"well, we'll seewhat happens"? --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, br=
ucehalliday<paranormalinvestigating@> wrote:>> Bill,> > You have theright i=
dea, I recently have dealt with a lot> of negativity from myFrank's box. Ha=
rmony is very important> as is the right frame of mindbefore turning the bo=
x on.> > hope you & the family had a goodholiday.> > Bruce> > Bruce Hallida=
y Paranormal Investigating Team > >> To: EVP-ITC@: vilhellm@: Fri, 23 Nov 2=
007 02:46:20+0000Subject:[EVP-ITC] Family hour around the radio> > > > > Ma=
ybe we're just alittle unconventional in our household, but mostof us here =
are prettyopen to the idea of the multiverse. Gathering ina circle around o=
urFrank's Box is our idea of quality family time.The messages arerelevent, =
the interest is high, and we're very wellgrounded and do notlet the trickst=
ers push us around.HappyThanksgiving from our home toyours. -Bill > > > > >=
 > >__________________________________________________________> Connectand =
share in new ways with WindowsLive.>http://www.windowslive.com/connect.html=
?ocid=3DTXT_TAGLM_Wave2_newways_112007>> > > > > > > ______________________=

 I used to record sessions with my young grand son sitting=
 on my lap cuz the box would use his voice to talk me, it was a real k=
ick, and no harm ever came to the Grandson. I think your concerns are unfou=
nded. <BR>
 <BR>
 I talk about darkheads cuz I dont' know wh=
at it is for sure, a level, or faction that wants humanity kept inthe dark =
by using fear and deception. I you don't take them serious therye are far l=
ess affective in their work. By getting all fearful and full of "concerns" =
you are doing their work. <BR>
 <BR>
 I'll say it again, and offe=
nd the majority, but what you all think is known about the paranormal =
is mostly Hollywood. All the evidence you think you have is primarily creat=
ed out of your own expectations. This place you think is the physical is no=
 more solid than the spirits you chase. You can't trust your senses, any of=
 them. <BR>
 <BR>
 Frank-S<BR><BR><BR>
